amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate the port security grant program in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 109-450 to strike the $400 million authorization for a new Port Security Program which would block the creation of an additional federal Homeland Security grant program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A014) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A014) Failed by voice vote.
